body.endpoints: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array containing user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves user object with matching username searched containing username, avatar_url and name properties

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles?topic=.description: serves an array of all articles that match the topic query

GET /api/articles?limit=[number value]&p.description: serves a pagination based array of articles with max limit length

GET /api/articles?sort_by=[column_name]&.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by column name and ordered desc / asc

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of an article
